io.confluent.ksql.rest.server

Class MaximumLagFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.confluent.ksql.rest.server.MaximumLagFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RoutingFilter

    public final class MaximumLagFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements RoutingFilter
    A RoutingFilter that filters hosts based upon changelog processing lag.

      • create

        public static java.util.Optional<MaximumLagFilter> create(java.util.Optional<LagReportingAgent> lagReportingAgent,
                                                          RoutingOptions routingOptions,
                                                          java.util.List<KsqlHostInfo> hosts,
                                                          java.lang.String applicationQueryId,
                                                          java.lang.String storeName,
                                                          int partition)
        Creates a FreshnessFilter
        Parameters:
        lagReportingAgent - The optional lag reporting agent.
        routingOptions - The routing options
        hosts - The set of all hosts that have the store, including actives and standbys
        applicationQueryId - The query id of the persistent query that materialized the table
        storeName - The state store name of the materialized table
        partition - The partition of the topic
        Returns:
        a new FreshnessFilter, unless lag reporting is disabled.
